DOC.brief_summary: This study aim assess short term efficacy combination immunochemotherapy patient relapse B-cell chronic lymphatic leukemia .
DOC.brief_title: Fludarabine , Cyclophosphamide , Alemtuzumab Patients With B-cell Chronic Lymphatic Leukemia ( B-CLL )
DOC.criteria: BCLL need treatment One two prior prior therapy WHO performance status 02 Serum creatinine > 1.5 ULN Major organ dysfunction Pregnant nursing
